name: Hawaiian Music
description: Includes a variety of syncopated rhythms, percussion and vocal styles, including chanting (mele) and falsetto.

children.name: Hapa haole
children.description: Hawaiian musical traditions adapted to popular American Jazz and Pop styles.

children.name: Jawaiian
children.description: Hawaiian branch of Reggae, typically blends local traditional melodies, harmonies, incorporating specialty instruments such as ukulele and steel guitar.

children.name: Slack-Key Guitar
children.description: Originated in Hawaii and typically played with one's thumb in an alternating-bass pattern on the lower two or three strings.
